Testimony from a caller to a radio talk: disease from wearing the same mask every day.
Expert opinion from Dr: Taison Bell, a critical care and infectious disease physician, stating that Legionella bacteria cannot persistently live on a mask and that the moisture from breath does not cause Legionella.
Confirmation from Shanta Whitaker: a microbiology expert, that Legionella bacteria is not found on the skin or body and that Legionnaires' disease cannot be contracted from wearing face masks.
